question: 6) Energy – Multiple Choice Scientists at Lawrence Berkeley National Lab are accelerating electrons to energies of 7.8 giga-electron-volts at the BELLA center. answer: Y) KILOGRAM-METER SQUARED PER SECOND SQUARED
